title: Lowest Taxes on Exports
description: In 2018, Panama had one of the lowest taxes on exports, amounting to just 150 local currency units.

title: Minimal Impact of Health Expenditure on Poverty
description: In 2017, only 0.01% of Panama's population was pushed below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care expenses, one of the lowest rates globally.
